alert.note: Alert for Tallahatchie (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tallahatchie County through 445 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Paynes, or 12 miles southwest of Charleston, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Paynes, Distall, Leverett, Swan Lake, Cascilla, Tippo, Effie and Rosebloom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
